title: Is this a font?
content:
I am trying to figure out if the text for ’THIRST’ is a font or custom made. If it is a font, does anyone know what the it is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [144564727\_0d23173f1d.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091010041126/http:/typophile.com/files/144564727_0d23173f1d.jpg) | 99.73 KB |
author: blaketypo

comments.content:
It could likely be altered type, but have a look at Diesel by Edwardo Recife of Misprinted Type. Its free, BTW.

[http://www.misprintedtype.com/v4/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091010041126/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/v4/ "http://www.misprintedtype.com/v4/")
Knowing RIck Valicenti’s work, that’s the product of some kind of programming using something like Scriptographer in Illustrator.
